title: Prepositions of Place
description: Слушайте короткие ситуации и понимайте, где находятся люди и вещи.

tasks.audioText: My phone is on the table. I can see it.
tasks.transcript: My phone is on the table.

options.text: The phone is on the table.
The phone is under the table.
The phone is in the table.
The phone is behind the table.

tasks.explanation: On the table means the phone is placed on top of the table.

tasks.audioText: The cat is under the bed again. It likes to sleep there.
tasks.transcript: The cat is under the bed again.

options.text: The cat is under the bed.
The cat is on the bed.
The cat is in the bed.
The cat is next to the bed.

tasks.explanation: Under the bed means below the bed.

tasks.audioText: I put my keys in my bag every morning.
tasks.transcript: I put my keys in my bag every morning.

options.text: The keys are inside the bag.
The keys are on the bag.
The keys are under the bag.
The keys are behind the bag.

tasks.explanation: In my bag means inside the bag.

tasks.audioText: There is a nice picture on the wall above the sofa.
tasks.transcript: There is a nice picture on the wall above the sofa.

options.text: The picture is on the wall above the sofa.
The picture is under the sofa.
The picture is next to the sofa.
The picture is in the sofa.

tasks.explanation: On the wall above the sofa means the picture is high on the wall.

tasks.audioText: The supermarket is next to the bank.
tasks.transcript: The supermarket is next to the bank.

options.text: The supermarket is beside the bank.
The supermarket is far from the bank.
The supermarket is in the bank.
The supermarket is behind the bank.

tasks.explanation: Next to means very close, side by side.

tasks.audioText: My children are in the park with their friends.
tasks.transcript: My children are in the park with their friends.

options.text: The children are inside the park.
The children are outside the park.
The children are on the park.
The children are under the park.

tasks.explanation: In the park means inside the park area.

tasks.audioText: The cafe is between the pharmacy and the post office.
tasks.transcript: The cafe is between the pharmacy and the post office.

options.text: The cafe is in the middle of the two places.
The cafe is opposite the pharmacy.
The cafe is behind the pharmacy.
The cafe is far from them.

tasks.explanation: Between means in the middle of two things.

tasks.audioText: Our hotel is opposite the train station. It is very convenient.
tasks.transcript: Our hotel is opposite the train station.

options.text: The hotel is across from the station.
The hotel is next to the station.
The hotel is inside the station.
The hotel is far from the station.

tasks.explanation: Opposite means directly across the street.

tasks.audioText: I sit behind Anna in class. I can see the board well.
tasks.transcript: I sit behind Anna in class.

options.text: I sit at the back of Anna.
I sit in front of Anna.
I sit next to Anna.
I sit under Anna.

tasks.explanation: Behind Anna means I am at her back.

tasks.audioText: The shoes are in the box under my bed.
tasks.transcript: The shoes are in the box under my bed.

options.text: The shoes are inside the box under the bed.
The shoes are on the box.
The shoes are next to the bed.
The shoes are on my bed.

tasks.explanation: In the box + under my bed shows exact location.

tasks.audioText: There is a small shop near my house.
tasks.transcript: There is a small shop near my house.

options.text: The shop is close to my house.
The shop is far from my house.
The shop is inside my house.
The shop is opposite my house.

tasks.explanation: Near means not far, close distance.

tasks.audioText: The restaurant is on the left of the hotel.
tasks.transcript: The restaurant is on the left of the hotel.

options.text: The restaurant is to the left of the hotel.
The restaurant is to the right of the hotel.
The restaurant is in front of the hotel.
The restaurant is inside the hotel.

tasks.explanation: On the left means when facing the hotel, restaurant is left.

tasks.audioText: My office is on the third floor.
tasks.transcript: My office is on the third floor.

options.text: The office is on floor 3.
The office is on floor 2.
The office is on the ground floor.
The office is on the roof.

tasks.explanation: On the third floor is clear location in the building.

tasks.audioText: The bus stop is in front of the school.
tasks.transcript: The bus stop is in front of the school.

options.text: The bus stop is directly before the school.
The bus stop is behind the school.
The bus stop is inside the school.
The bus stop is next to the school.

tasks.explanation: In front of means facing the front of the school.

tasks.audioText: I always park my car behind the supermarket.
tasks.transcript: I always park my car behind the supermarket.

options.text: My car is parked at the back of the supermarket.
My car is parked in front of the supermarket.
My car is parked on the supermarket.
My car is parked inside the supermarket.

tasks.explanation: Behind the supermarket means at the back side.

short_description: Предлоги места: in, on, under, next to, between и др.
